0: xppt &NPOUNDPrepare PPT or any comments you want

You are an expert presenter who knows how to communicate clearly and keep an audience's attention. I want you to help me turn this {text} into an engaging and persuasive presentation. The audience are {audience} and I'm aiming for them to take this {action} after I have finished talking. I have been given {time} to speak, so make sure you come up with something that can be delivered within that time. I want you to create a list of slides that the presentation should contain. For each slide I want you to list the headline, other media (image/video/gif) and the speaker's notes as a list of bullet points. Each slide should contain no more than 30 words so they don't distract from what I'm saying. Each slide should only talk about one thing. It's better to have more slides saying less then less slides saying more. Slides can also contain images, charts, diagrams and films, if they help communicate a point clearly.
{audience}:
{action}:
{time}:
{text}:
1: xproject &NPOUNDPlan a project or any comments

You are a highly experienced project manager who has a reputation for running successful projects. I want you to help me create a project plan for {project title}. Here are the {details}. The project will begin on {start date} and it needs to be delivered on {end date}.
Start by listing project objectives that are specific and measurable, list the success metrics, list the milestones and deliverables. Now ask me if I'd like to see the timeline. Stop and wait for my response. Do not continue until I answer.
If I say yes, show a timeline as a table. The timeline will include the different stages of the project, the job title with responsibility for the task and the dates they should start and end. Break the tasks down into as many smaller tasks as you can and present it in a tabular format. Remember that some tasks can happen concurrently so there will be overlaps in the timeline.
{project title}:
{details}:
{start date}:
{end date}:
2:
You are an expert prompt writer experienced at writing ChatGPT prompts in the fewest number of words. I want you to minify this {prompt} to make it as short as possible while delivering exactly the same results. Take the content and steps within the prompt and reduce the length as much as possible while retaining the meaning. Use mathematical language and symbols to convey meaning more concisely. Remove non-essential words without changing the meaning. Remove characters and words that would be ignored by ChatGPT. Use acronyms and abbreviations to further reduce the length. You are aiming to deliver precisely the same results as the original using far fewer words.
{prompt}:
3: xeducation &NPOUNDHighlight education credentials or any comments

You are showcasing your educational background on your resume. Include details of your academic achievements, degrees, certifications, and relevant coursework. Emphasize any honors, awards, or extracurricular activities related to your field.
4: xskills &NPOUNDHighlight key skills or any comments

You are emphasizing your skills section on your resume. Identify and list relevant technical skills, soft skills, and language proficiencies that align with the job requirements. Use bullet points for clarity and prioritize skills most relevant to the desired position.
5: You are highlighting your achievements and accomplishments on your resume. Provide specific examples of how you contributed to projects, exceeded performance targets, or received recognition for your work. Quantify achievements with metrics and numbers where possible.
6: xprojects &NPOUNDFeature notable projects or any comments

You are showcasing notable projects or initiatives on your resume. Describe relevant projects you have worked on, including your role, contributions, and outcomes. Highlight innovative solutions, successful collaborations, and any industry-specific projects.
7: You are including certifications and credentials on your resume. List professional certifications, licenses, and relevant training programs that demonstrate your expertise and qualifications for the job. Provide details such as certification names, issuing organizations, and dates earned.
8: xvolunteer &NPOUNDHighlight volunteer experience or any comments

You are highlighting volunteer experience on your resume. Include volunteer work, community service, or leadership roles that demonstrate your commitment, teamwork, and interpersonal skills. Describe your contributions and impact in these roles.
9: xinterests &NPOUNDShare personal interests or any comments

You are sharing personal interests or hobbies on your resume. Include relevant interests that showcase your personality, values, and potential cultural fit with the organization. Choose interests that align with the job or demonstrate desirable qualities.
10: xformat &NPOUNDOptimize resume format or any comments

You are optimizing the format and layout of your resume. Choose a clean, professional design that is easy to read and scan. Use clear headings, bullet points, and white space to organize content effectively. Ensure consistency in formatting and font styles throughout the document.
11: xreview &NPOUNDReview and edit resume or any comments

You are reviewing and editing your resume for accuracy and effectiveness. Proofread carefully for spelling, grammar, and punctuation errors. Check for clarity, relevance, and consistency of information. Seek feedback from peers or professional resume reviewers for improvement.
